Installing send-pr on your system

If you receive send-pr as part of a larger software distribution, it probably gets installed when the full distribution is installed. If you are using PRMS at your site as well, you must decide where send-pr sends Problem Reports by default; see section Setting a default site.

  • installation: installing `send-pr' by itself
  • default site: setting a default site
